# dataharvestR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codacy Badge](https://app.codacy.com/project/badge/Grade/e715df42acef461bac6f4e0d6ba8181b)](https://www.codacy.com?utm_source=github.com&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=januarharianto/dataharvestR&amp;utm_campaign=Badge_Grade)
<!-- badges: end -->

The `dataharvestR` package is the R interface to the AgReFed Data-Harvester project.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `dataharvestR` using the code below:

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("januarharianto/dataharvestR")
```
